com.estimote.mgmtsdk.feature.settings.api

Class Sensors.Motion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.estimote.mgmtsdk.feature.settings.api.Sensors.Motion
  • Enclosing class:
    Sensors

    public class Sensors.Motion
extends java.lang.Object
    Accelerometer (aka motion sensor) settings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Motion() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DeviceSetting<java.lang.Integer> delay()
      It's a 32-bit value describing how long beacon will advertise after it stops moving when motion only advertising is enabled.
      DeviceSetting<java.lang.Boolean> enabled()
      Enables/disables motion detection.
      NotifiableDeviceSetting<java.lang.Boolean> state()
      Checks if device is in motion.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Motion

        public Motion()

    • Method Detail

      • enabled

        public DeviceSetting<java.lang.Boolean> enabled()
        Enables/disables motion detection.

      • delay

        public DeviceSetting<java.lang.Integer> delay()
        It's a 32-bit value describing how long beacon will advertise after it stops moving when motion only advertising is enabled. The value is in milliseconds and valid range is from 0 to 300 000.

      • state

        public NotifiableDeviceSetting<java.lang.Boolean> state()
        Checks if device is in motion. Allows to register for value change.

        Note: You need to enable motion detection in order to receive notification.
